text.author: Roy Greenslade
text.description: The anticipated sale of Emap France to the Italian publisher Mondadori controlled by former prime minister Silvio Berlusconi, has been completed already for €545m (£372m). In a brief statement to the London Stock Exchange, Emap said, again as expected, that it planned to return proceeds from the sale of its 43 French titles to its shareholders. (Via adetocqueville.com)
text.title: Berlusconi company buys Emap France

main.p: The anticipated sale of Emap France to the Italian publisher Mondadori controlled by former prime minister Silvio Berlusconi, has been completed already for €545m (£372m). In a brief statement to the London Stock Exchange, Emap said, again as expected, that it planned to return proceeds from the sale of its 43 French titles to its shareholders. (Via adetocqueville.com)
